messages.messageBody:
http://homepage.mac.com/mstanforth/PhotoAlbum45.html




I have posted Field notes 2 at my blog, ourmenagerie@.... The above link is a website of my Dad's but the last choice will show some photos of us. I wish I had had time to figure out how to put these on my blog. And I will, but have worked about 75 hours per week the 2 weeks the kids have been gone to help pay for our month in NC and there's been no time to learn how to put photos on the blog. I am sorry for the inconvenience for anyone who wants to look. Thanks...Cameron_._,___
